casebody.data:
William BETTS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 17, 2019

Deren Manasevit, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Nancy L. Chupak, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner William Betts' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 188 Conn. App. 397, 204 A.3d 1221, 2019 WL 1107482 (AC 40587) (2019), is denied.
